snippet.title: Scream 7 - Official 'Kevin Williamson on Directing Scream 7' Behind-the-Scenes (2026) Neve Campbell
snippet.description:
Join stars Neve Campbell, Mason Gooding, Jasmin Savoy Brown, and Isabel May, along with director/co-writer Kevin Williamson, for a behind-the-scenes look at Scream in this latest video for the upcoming horror movie. Watch as creator Kevin Williamson discusses taking on the director's role for the first time in the franchise. Scream 7 also stars Courteney Cox, Anna Camp, Joel McHale, Mckenna Grace, Michelle Randolph, Jimmy Tatro, Asa Germann, Celeste O’Connor, Sam Rechner, Ethan Embry, Tim Simons and Mark Consuelos. 

When a new Ghostface killer emerges in the quiet town where Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) has built a new life, her darkest fears are realized as her daughter (Isabel May) becomes the next target. Determined to protect her family, Sidney must face the horrors of her past to put an end to the bloodshed once and for all.

Scream 7 is produced by William Sherak, James Vanderbilt, and Paul Neinstein. It is based on characters created by Kevin Williamson. The story is by James Vanderbilt & Guy Busick. The screenplay is by Kevin Williamson and Guy Busick.

Scream 7 opens in theaters on February 27, 2026.
